      • save

        public ActiveBookRenting save​(java.lang.String user_name,
                              java.lang.Long book_id)
                       throws javassist.NotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: ActiveBookRentingService
        This option will save into database user, by id, who is renting a book by book id, book-copy by id that is rented and dateOfRenting - day when book was rented
        Specified by:
        save in interface ActiveBookRentingService
        Parameters:
        user_name - user who is renting a book
        book_id - of book that user wants to rent param freeBookCopyID is copy of the book user rents
        Returns:
        user_id, book_id, book_copy_id, date_of_renting
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - user want to rent a book but there is no book-copies to rent
        javassist.NotFoundException - - there is no such user or there is no free copies for renting
